Title: Help Wanted
Writer: Craig Johnson (based upon the "Walt Longmire Mysteries" book series by), Hunt Baldwin (developed for television by), John Coveny (developed for television by), Tony Tost
Actors: Robert Taylor, Katee Sackhoff, Lou Diamond Phillips, Cassidy Freeman
Plot: Walt suspects a chain robbery when a late veterans husband is shot during a break in and a warehouse full of pharmaceuticals is robbed. The sheriffs department is scouting for new recruits.
